# systemisAI

> AI Solutions company based in Argentina, serving Latin America, Spain and the United States. We build and deploy AI-powered products and custom architectures that automate business processes and deliver measurable ROI from month one.

## What we do

systemisAI helps companies adopt Artificial Intelligence through three service lines:

- **Atendi** — Enterprise conversational agent that automates customer support, sales, bookings and FAQs via WhatsApp. Ready to deploy in days.
- **Agili** — AI-powered Project Manager that lives inside your existing tools (Notion, Slack, Jira, etc.), connects your data and turns ideas into executable tasks automatically.
- **Custom AI** — End-to-end consulting, design, training and deployment of bespoke AI models, RAG systems, LLM pipelines and autonomous agents tailored to specific business use cases.

## Our process

1. **Discovery** — Analyse workflows and identify high-impact automation opportunities.
2. **Selection** — Choose the right product or design a fully custom AI architecture.
3. **Implementation** — Secure deployment, system integration and performance testing.
4. **Evolution** — Continuous monitoring, model refinement and guaranteed scalability.

## Why companies choose us

- Bilingual support (Spanish & English)
- Solutions built around your specific processes — no generic templates
- Results measured in real ROI: time saved, costs reduced, concrete metrics
- Short delivery cycles, no endless projects
- Continuous post-launch support

Spanish (primary), English
